resources.string: To check for an update, tap the button below. If a new version is available, you will see a notification.
New MROM version available, visit www.montuori.net to download.
Checking for new version, please wait...
Unfortunately this device is not compatible with any of the MROM versions currently available.

No internet connection available.
Please check your connection and try again.

Error checking for new version.
Please try again later.

New version of MROM available!

Latest version:
%s

Please visit www.montuori.net to download.
You are running the latest version of MROM.
